tools.name: create_document
tools.description:
Create a new Word document
    
    Parameters:
    - file_path: Document save path

tools.name: open_document
tools.description:
Open an existing Word document
    
    Parameters:
    - file_path: Path to the document to open

tools.name: save_document
tools.description: Save the currently open Word document to the original file (update the original file)

tools.name: add_paragraph
tools.description:
Add paragraph text to document
    
    Parameters:
    - text: Paragraph text content
    - bold: Whether to bold
    - italic: Whether to italicize
    - underline: Whether to underline
    - font_size: Font size (points)
    - font_name: Font name
    - color: Text color (format: #FF0000)
    - alignment: Alignment (left, center, right, justify)

tools.name: add_heading
tools.description:
Add heading to document
    
    Parameters:
    - text: Heading text
    - level: Heading level (1-9)

tools.name: add_table
tools.description:
Add table to document
    
    Parameters:
    - rows: Number of rows
    - cols: Number of columns
    - data: Table data, two-dimensional array

tools.name: get_document_info
tools.description: Get document information, including paragraph count, table count, styles, etc.

tools.name: search_text
tools.description:
Search for text in the document
    
    Parameters:
    - keyword: Keyword to search for

tools.name: search_and_replace
tools.description:
Search and replace text in the document, providing detailed replacement information and preview options
    
    Parameters:
    - keyword: Keyword to search for
    - replace_with: Text to replace with
    - preview_only: Whether to only preview without actually replacing, default is False

tools.name: find_and_replace
tools.description:
Find and replace text in the document
    
    Parameters:
    - find_text: Text to find
    - replace_text: Text to replace with

tools.name: merge_table_cells
tools.description:
Merge table cells
    
    Parameters:
    - table_index: Table index
    - start_row: Start row index
    - start_col: Start column index
    - end_row: End row index
    - end_col: End column index

tools.name: split_table
tools.description:
Split table into two tables at specified row
    
    Parameters:
    - table_index: Table index
    - row_index: Split table after this row

tools.name: add_table_row
tools.description:
Add a row to table
    
    Parameters:
    - table_index: Table index
    - data: Row data in list format

tools.name: delete_table_row
tools.description:
Delete a row from table
    
    Parameters:
    - table_index: Table index
    - row_index: Row index to delete

tools.name: edit_table_cell
tools.description:
Edit table cell content
    
    Parameters:
    - table_index: Table index
    - row_index: Row index
    - col_index: Column index
    - text: Cell text

tools.name: add_page_break
tools.description: Add page break

tools.name: set_page_margins
tools.description:
Set page margins
    
    Parameters:
    - top: Top margin (cm)
    - bottom: Bottom margin (cm)
    - left: Left margin (cm)
    - right: Right margin (cm)

tools.name: delete_paragraph
tools.description:
Delete specified paragraph from document
    
    Parameters:
    - paragraph_index: Paragraph index to delete

tools.name: delete_text
tools.description:
Delete specified text from paragraph
    
    Parameters:
    - paragraph_index: Paragraph index
    - start_pos: Start position (0-based index)
    - end_pos: End position (not included in the text)

tools.name: save_as_document
tools.description:
Save current document as a new file
    
    Parameters:
    - new_file_path: Path to save the new file

tools.name: create_document_copy
tools.description:
Create a copy of the current document in the directory of the original file
    
    Parameters:
    - suffix: Suffix to add to the original file name, default is "-副本"

tools.name: replace_section
tools.description:
Find specified title in document and replace content under that title, keeping original position, format, and style
    
    Parameters:
    - section_title: Title text to find
    - new_content: New content list, each element is a paragraph
    - preserve_title: Whether to keep original title, default is True

tools.name: edit_section_by_keyword
tools.description:
Find paragraphs containing specified keyword and replace them and their surrounding content, keeping original position, format, and style
    
    Parameters:
    - keyword: Keyword to find
    - new_content: New content list, each element is a paragraph
    - section_range: Surrounding paragraph range to replace, default is 3

create_document.case_name: 创建新文档到指定路径
create_document.purpose: 验证工具可以成功创建一个新的Word文档并保存到指定路径

create_document.case_name: 使用已有文件路径尝试覆盖写入
create_document.purpose: 验证工具是否能正确处理已存在的文件路径，确保其能覆盖或重新生成文件
